main.slogan_after_different: custom ROM for Meizu M6 note.

opensource.title: Open-Source
opensource.description: MeizuSucks kernel is fully open source and you can explore its code on our GitHub. This provides you latest security patches, polished drivers and be sure that there are no backdoors in ROM. LineageOS is open source too.

better_photos.title: Take better photos
better_photos.description: MeizuSucks ROM provides you open source camera HAL, which allows you to use RAW, Camera2API and of course Google Camera!

new_android.title: New Android
new_android.description: MeizuSucks provides you fresh Android version with new drivers and security patches. This gives you better performance in OS and games.

bootloader.title: Unlock bootloader
bootloader.description: Unlock your bootloader by following guides from 4PDA or XDA. These steps are common for all M6 Note ROMs.

orangefox.title: Install OrangeFox
orangefox.description: Install OrangeFox recovery with modern UI and advaned features in comparsion with official TWRP.

modem.title: Install Flyme 8 modem
modem.description: To avoid some unexpected bugs, you need to install Flyme 8 modem and some other firmwares from it. All of these firmwares located in this patch:

install.title: Install MeizuSucks!
install.description: Download MeizuSucks from download section of this website, wipe data, cache, dalvik-cache and system, then flash MeizuSucks!
install.note: Note: install BitGAPPS/NikGAPPS after MeizuSucks if needed. Installation of Magisk disallows you to send bug reports and get help from developers.

report.title: Report a bug
report.addons_note: (which GAPPS have you installed and any other patches)
report.dima_mode: Maybe your bug was already detected?
